body:
We used [GOV.UK Elements](https://govuk-elements.herokuapp.com) to build this service. GOV.UK Elements has now been replaced by the [GOV.UK Design System](https://design-system.service.gov.uk), but we will still carry out major bug fixes and security patches.

Basic tests were performed on this online service on 7 November 2019. These tests were carried out by the Ministry of Justice.

We tested the homepage, the privacy policy, cookies and the terms and conditions.

We also tested interaction with third-party content, including embedded video content.

- getting emotional support
- professional mediation
- lawyer negotiation
- collaborative law
- going to court
heading: About the accessibility of this online service
